div.h2: Revenue Center NDC Quantity Qualifier Code

div.p: Effective with Version 'J', the code used to indicate the unit of measurement for the drug that was administered. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/revcntrndcqtyqlfr_cd
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

name.value: Revenue Center NDC Quantity Qualifier Code

description.value: Effective with Version 'J', the code used to indicate the unit of measurement for the drug that was administered. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/rev_cntr_ndc_qty_qlfr_cd
